purpose: To facilitate the development of AI agents that can integrate with any large language model (LLM) and provide robust observability and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) features.
principle: Built on TypeScript, it leverages modular components to support various LLMs and provides tools for implementing RAG and monitoring agent performance.
reusability: Highly composable with support for various LLMs, offering APIs and plugins for easy integration into existing systems.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited documentation and stability issues typical of early development projects.
